text: Eugene Codrington, Birmingham, United Kingdom) is a British karateka. He has an 8th Dan black belt in karate and is the winner of multiple European Karate Championships and was part of first non- Japanese team to win a World Karate Championships. Eugene is a founder member of the English Karate Governing Board (EKGB) for whom he is Senior Coach. ==Achievements== * 1975 European Karate Championships Kumite Gold Medal * 1978 European Karate Championships Kumite Gold Medal * 1975 World Karate Championships Team Kumite Gold Medal * 1977 World Karate Championships Kumite Silver Medal ==References== Category:Sportspeople from Birmingham, West Midlands Category:Living people Category:English male karateka Category:Wadō-ryū practitioners Category:Karate coaches Category:Black English sportspeople Category:British male karateka Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Eugene Codrington
